name: Dice!
description:
Dice is a simple game a made when I was bored. It is a simulation of what a dice would role. You can use this instead of normal dice, the role is random(Mostly)

You can also play this game just because it's satisfying. Im planning on adding more features later.

Hope you enjoy. - Coco
